mapper.select: SELECT typ.borrow_project_type, typ.borrow_cd, typ.borrow_name, typ.borrow_class, typ.invest_start, typ.invest_end, typ.increase_money, typ.interest_coupon, typ.taste_money, typ.invest_user_type, typ.status, typ.remark, typ.create_user_id, typ.update_user_id, GROUP_CONCAT("", pr.repay_method, "") AS method_name, typ.increase_interest_flag FROM ht_borrow_project_type typ LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_repay pr ON typ.borrow_class = pr.borrow_class where typ.borrow_cd=#{borrowCd}
